:::{#person-profile}
Stefanie is a postdoctoral researcher at the Department of Interdisciplinary Social Science of Utrecht University. Her research covers a variety of topics related to social inequality, migration and integration, and education. Before joining Utrecht University, she was a postdoctoral research fellow at the Economic and Social Research Institute. She obtained her PhD from the Department of Sociology at Trinity College Dublin. 
:::
